*   **09/2021**: Participated in a live coding session where I tried to predict the 2021 Brownlow Medal Winner for the Australian Football League (AFL). This was [Rob Nguyen](https://twitter.com/roberto_boberto)'s idea, where he wanted to pair up a stats person with no knowledge of Aussie rules with a journalist with domain expertise to see how well they can do at making predictions. Here are links to a [video recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cd9yLYPSosM) and an [article](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2021-09-19/afl-trying-to-predict-the-2021-brownlow-medal-winner/100472246) on ABC News (Australia).
